00035 /* Buffer Params */
00036 
00037 BufferParams::BufferParams()
00038 {
00039     width = 0;
00040     height = 0;
00041 
00042     full_x = 0;
00043     full_y = 0;
00044     full_width = 0;
00045     full_height = 0;
00046 
00047     Pass::add(PASS_COMBINED, passes);
00048 }
00049 
00050 void BufferParams::get_offset_stride(int& offset, int& stride)
00051 {
00052     offset = -(full_x + full_y*width);
00053     stride = width;
00054 }
00055 
00056 bool BufferParams::modified(const BufferParams& params)
00057 {
00058     return !(full_x == params.full_x
00059         && full_y == params.full_y
00060         && width == params.width
00061         && height == params.height
00062         && full_width == params.full_width
00063         && full_height == params.full_height
00064         && Pass::equals(passes, params.passes));
00065 }
00066 
00067 int BufferParams::get_passes_size()
00068 {
00069     int size = 0;
00070 
00071     foreach(Pass& pass, passes)
00072         size += pass.components;
00073     
00074     return align_up(size, 4);
00075 }

00077 /* Render Buffers */
00078 
00079 RenderBuffers::RenderBuffers(Device *device_)
00080 {
00081     device = device_;
00082 }
00083 
00084 RenderBuffers::~RenderBuffers()
00085 {
00086     device_free();
00087 }
00088 
00089 void RenderBuffers::device_free()
00090 {
00091     if(buffer.device_pointer) {
00092         device->mem_free(buffer);
00093         buffer.clear();
00094     }
00095 
00096     if(rng_state.device_pointer) {
00097         device->mem_free(rng_state);
00098         rng_state.clear();
00099     }
00100 }
00101 
00102 void RenderBuffers::reset(Device *device, BufferParams& params_)
00103 {
00104     params = params_;
00105 
00106     /* free existing buffers */
00107     device_free();
00108     
00109     /* allocate buffer */
00110     buffer.resize(params.width*params.height*params.get_passes_size());
00111     device->mem_alloc(buffer, MEM_READ_WRITE);
00112     device->mem_zero(buffer);
00113 
00114     /* allocate rng state */
00115     rng_state.resize(params.width, params.height);
00116 
00117     uint *init_state = rng_state.resize(params.width, params.height);
00118     int x, y, width = params.width, height = params.height;
00119     
00120     for(x=0; x<width; x++)
00121         for(y=0; y<height; y++)
00122             init_state[x + y*width] = hash_int_2d(params.full_x+x, params.full_y+y);
00123 
00124     device->mem_alloc(rng_state, MEM_READ_WRITE);
00125     device->mem_copy_to(rng_state);
00126 }
00127 
00128 bool RenderBuffers::copy_from_device()
00129 {
00130     if(!buffer.device_pointer)
00131         return false;
00132 
00133     device->mem_copy_from(buffer, 0, params.width, params.height, params.get_passes_size()*sizeof(float));
00134 
00135     return true;
00136 }
00137 
00138 bool RenderBuffers::get_pass(PassType type, float exposure, int sample, int components, float *pixels)
00139 {
00140     int pass_offset = 0;
00141 
00142     foreach(Pass& pass, params.passes) {
00143         if(pass.type != type) {
00144             pass_offset += pass.components;
00145             continue;
00146         }
00147 
00148         float *in = (float*)buffer.data_pointer + pass_offset;
00149         int pass_stride = params.get_passes_size();
00150 
00151         float scale = (pass.filter)? 1.0f/(float)sample: 1.0f;
00152         float scale_exposure = (pass.exposure)? scale*exposure: scale;
00153 
00154         int size = params.width*params.height;
00155 
00156         if(components == 1) {
00157             assert(pass.components == components);
00158 
00159             /* scalar */
00160             if(type == PASS_DEPTH) {
00161                 for(int i = 0; i < size; i++, in += pass_stride, pixels++) {
00162                     float f = *in;
00163                     pixels[0] = (f == 0.0f)? 1e10f: f*scale_exposure;
00164                 }
00165             }
00166             else {
00167                 for(int i = 0; i < size; i++, in += pass_stride, pixels++) {
00168                     float f = *in;
00169                     pixels[0] = f*scale_exposure;
00170                 }
00171             }
00172         }
00173         else if(components == 3) {
00174             assert(pass.components == 4);
00175 
00176             if(pass.divide_type != PASS_NONE) {
00177                 /* RGB lighting passes that need to divide out color */
00178                 pass_offset = 0;
00179                 foreach(Pass& color_pass, params.passes) {
00180                     if(color_pass.type == pass.divide_type)
00181                         break;
00182                     pass_offset += color_pass.components;
00183                 }
00184 
00185                 float *in_divide = (float*)buffer.data_pointer + pass_offset;
00186 
00187                 for(int i = 0; i < size; i++, in += pass_stride, in_divide += pass_stride, pixels += 3) {
00188                     float3 f = make_float3(in[0], in[1], in[2]);
00189                     float3 f_divide = make_float3(in_divide[0], in_divide[1], in_divide[2]);
00190 
00191                     f = safe_divide_color(f*exposure, f_divide);
00192 
00193                     pixels[0] = f.x;
00194                     pixels[1] = f.y;
00195                     pixels[2] = f.z;
00196                 }
00197             }
00198             else {
00199                 /* RGB/vector */
00200                 for(int i = 0; i < size; i++, in += pass_stride, pixels += 3) {
00201                     float3 f = make_float3(in[0], in[1], in[2]);
00202 
00203                     pixels[0] = f.x*scale_exposure;
00204                     pixels[1] = f.y*scale_exposure;
00205                     pixels[2] = f.z*scale_exposure;
00206                 }
00207             }
00208         }
00209         else if(components == 4) {
00210             assert(pass.components == components);
00211 
00212             /* RGBA */
00213             if(type == PASS_SHADOW) {
00214                 for(int i = 0; i < size; i++, in += pass_stride, pixels += 4) {
00215                     float4 f = make_float4(in[0], in[1], in[2], in[3]);
00216                     float invw = (f.w > 0.0f)? 1.0f/f.w: 1.0f;
00217 
00218                     pixels[0] = f.x*invw;
00219                     pixels[1] = f.y*invw;
00220                     pixels[2] = f.z*invw;
00221                     pixels[3] = 1.0f;
00222                 }
00223             }
00224             else {
00225                 for(int i = 0; i < size; i++, in += pass_stride, pixels += 4) {
00226                     float4 f = make_float4(in[0], in[1], in[2], in[3]);
00227 
00228                     pixels[0] = f.x*scale_exposure;
00229                     pixels[1] = f.y*scale_exposure;
00230                     pixels[2] = f.z*scale_exposure;
00231 
00232                     /* clamp since alpha might be > 1.0 due to russian roulette */
00233                     pixels[3] = clamp(f.w*scale, 0.0f, 1.0f);
00234                 }
00235             }
00236         }
00237 
00238         return true;
00239     }
00240 
00241     return false;
00242 }

00246 DisplayBuffer::DisplayBuffer(Device *device_)
00247 {
00248     device = device_;
00249     draw_width = 0;
00250     draw_height = 0;
00251     transparent = true; /* todo: determine from background */
00252 }
00253 
00254 DisplayBuffer::~DisplayBuffer()
00255 {
00256     device_free();
00257 }
00258 
00259 void DisplayBuffer::device_free()
00260 {
00261     if(rgba.device_pointer) {
00262         device->pixels_free(rgba);
00263         rgba.clear();
00264     }
00265 }
00266 
00267 void DisplayBuffer::reset(Device *device, BufferParams& params_)
00268 {
00269     draw_width = 0;
00270     draw_height = 0;
00271 
00272     params = params_;
00273 
00274     /* free existing buffers */
00275     device_free();
00276 
00277     /* allocate display pixels */
00278     rgba.resize(params.width, params.height);
00279     device->pixels_alloc(rgba);
00280 }
00281 
00282 void DisplayBuffer::draw_set(int width, int height)
00283 {
00284     assert(width <= params.width && height <= params.height);
00285 
00286     draw_width = width;
00287     draw_height = height;
00288 }
00289 
00290 void DisplayBuffer::draw(Device *device)
00291 {
00292     if(draw_width != 0 && draw_height != 0)
00293         device->draw_pixels(rgba, 0, draw_width, draw_height, 0, params.width, params.height, transparent);
00294 }
00295 
00296 bool DisplayBuffer::draw_ready()
00297 {
00298     return (draw_width != 0 && draw_height != 0);
00299 }
00300 
00301 void DisplayBuffer::write(Device *device, const string& filename)
00302 {
00303     int w = draw_width;
00304     int h = draw_height;
00305 
00306     if(w == 0 || h == 0)
00307         return;
00308 
00309     /* read buffer from device */
00310     device->pixels_copy_from(rgba, 0, w, h);
00311 
00312     /* write image */
00313     ImageOutput *out = ImageOutput::create(filename);
00314     ImageSpec spec(w, h, 4, TypeDesc::UINT8);
00315     int scanlinesize = w*4*sizeof(uchar);
00316 
00317     out->open(filename, spec);
00318 
00319     /* conversion for different top/bottom convention */
00320     out->write_image(TypeDesc::UINT8,
00321         (uchar*)rgba.data_pointer + (h-1)*scanlinesize,
00322         AutoStride,
00323         -scanlinesize,
00324         AutoStride);
00325 
00326     out->close();
00327 
00328     delete out;
00329 }
